documents.document:
To everyone.

I am a fun loving person..I have a great personality..Love to meet new exciting people..My hopes and dreams are ..To live life to the full...and live happy everafter...Dreaming eh!!...We can surely dream..I am witty ...love to laugh..and make others laugh..Life is too short ....Live every waking moment...I love to talk...Sometimes i can be a little crazy..but lovely with it .lol.....exciting,loving,romantic,caring,understanding,not a bad combination eh.....All thats left for me to say..is hi to everyone...x

*Love*

Falling in love is the most wonderful feeling in the world!.When you fall out of love..It's the worst experience you can ever imagine..The pain and hurt stays with you for a long time..One thing i have learned!. Never to give my heart so freely. ******Loveheart3******

**The Meaning Of Love**

******LOVE*******,
If you love someone because you think that she is really georgeous!...Then it's not Love!.....It's Infatuation!...If you think that you love someone!..because you think that you shouldn't leave him because others think that you should!...Then it's not love!..It's Compromise!..If you think that you love someone!..because you think that you cannot live without their touch!..Then it's not love!..It's lust!...If you think that you love someone!.because you have been kissed by him!..Then it's not love!..It's inferiority Complex!..If you think that you love someone!..because you cannot leave him! thinking it would hurt his feelings!..Then it's not love!..It's Charity!...If you think that you love someone!..that you share everything with him!..Then it's not love!..It's Friendship!..But if you feel the pain of the other person more than him,even when he is stable and you cry for him!..That's LOVE!...If you get attracted to other people,but stay with him without any regrets!.That's LOVE!..If you let him go,knowing that he has to go,but dosn't want to!..That's LOVE!..
*****Love really cannot be discribed in words******* ****Love From Loveheart3****

* Someone somewhere cares*

When you are feeling alone like no one cares for you!..Read this!...As it's absolutely true!...Every night someone thinks about you before they go to bed!....At least 15 people in this world loves you!....The only reason someone wouldn't love you is!...Because they want to be just like you!....There at least 2 people in this world that would die for you!....You mean the world to someone!...Someone that you dont even know exists loves you!....When you make the biggest mistake ever!.....Something comes from it!.....When you think that the world has turned it's back on you!......Take a look!.....Always remember the compliments and thanks you've recieved throughout your life!.....As These are evidence of your true self!...Delete any negativity from your mind as all these thoughts are time wasting, spirituallly damaging and soul destroying!....Forget any rude remarks!..... Keep shinning my friends as your Warmth!..Humor and Light! is illuminating to many!...... If you are a loving person.....Your dreams will come true!...

******Smiles And Hugs********

****Peace Light And Love Always****

** LOVEHEART3**

****The Miracle of Love****

****Two minds hoping!...****Two hearts searching!...****Two bodies meeting!...****Two souls merging!.....*************One Miracle**********One Love***************

*A message from a dear friend*

If you love me?..(as a friend)...you'll read the whole thing!....What would you do if for every moment you were truely happy....There would be 10 moments of sadness?.......What would you do if your best friend died tomorrow and you never got the chance to tell them how you felt?......So!....I just wanted to say! even if i never talk with you again in my life....You are Special to me and you have made a difference in my life!..I look up to you!....I respect you!.....and truely cherrish you!.....*Remember* Everyone needs a friend!..Don't ever leave the one you love for the one you like!...Because the one you like will leave you!..for the one they love!....

***A True Friend***

If you are alone!....I'll be your shaddow!....If you want to cry!....I'll be your shoulder!......If you want a hug!.....I'll be your pillow!......If you need to be happy!.....I'll be your smile!.....But anytime you need a friend!...I'll be here waiting!......

********LOVE*******

When you fall in love!......It is temporary Madness!
It erupts like and Earthquake!...and then it subsides!
You have to make a decition!..........................
You have to work out whether your roots have become
So entwined together that it is inconceivable that you should ever part!..
Because this is what love is!........Love is not Breathlessness!....
It's not an excitement!.......It's not a desire! to mate every second of the day!.....
It is not lying awake at nights imagining that he is kissing every part of your body!...

Love itself!..is what is left over when being in Love.....*****Has Burned Out*****

******Life********

Don't think more about past!....It brings Tears....
Don't think more about the future!...It brings Fears!....
Live for every moment!...It brings cheers!...

Love the Heart that hurts you!..
But never hurt the Heart that Loves you!...

Keep Love in your Heart!.....
A life without it is like!....
A sunless garden!....
When the flowers are Dead!...

***LOVEHEART3***

Love like nobody ever hurt you!.....
Dance like nobody is watching!....
Sing like nobody is listening!....
Love as if there was Paradise on Earth!..

***LOVEHEART3***

! FORGET HIM !

Forget his name !
Forget his face !
Forget his kisses !
His warm embrace !
Forget the love that you once knew !
Remember he has someone new !
Forget him when they played your song !
Remember when you cried all night long !
Forget how close you once were !
Remember he has chosen her !
Forget how you memorized his walk !
Forget the way he used to talk !
Forget the things he used to say !
Remember he has gone away !
Forget his laugh forget his grin !
Forget the dimples on his chin !
Forget the way he held you tight !
Remember he's with her tonight !
Forget the time that went so fast !
Forget the love that moved, It's past !
Forget he said he'd leave you never !
Remember he's gone forever !....

*** LOVEHEART3***

!!!!!!! Joke !!!!!!!!

A little boy goes to his father and asks?
"Daddy, how was i born?.....

The father answers, "Well son,
I guess one day you will need
To find out anyway!
Your mom and i first got together
In a chat room on Yahoo!
Then i set up a date via e-mail with your mom!
And we met at a cyber-cafe
We sneaked into a secluded room,
Where your mother agreed to a download,
From my hard drive,
As soon as i was ready to upload,
We discovered that neither one of us,
Had used a firewall,
And since it was too late to hit the delete button,
Nine months later a little pop-up appeared that said!
"You got a male!....It was u in d mail!..

***LOVEHEART3***

****life***

Your sentiment is your love!
Your love is your heart!
Your heart is your spouse!
Your spouse is your future!
Your future is your destiny!
Your destiny is ambition!
Your ambition is your aspiration!
Your aspiration is your motivation!
Your motivation is your belief!
Your belief is your peace!
Your peace is your target!
Your target is heaven!

**loveheart3**

****Value Of A Friend****

If one day you feel the need to cry!
Call me!...I don't promise to make you laugh!
But i can cry with you!
If one day you want to run away!
Don't be afraid to call me!
I don't promise to ask you to stay!
But i can run with you!
If one day you don't want to listen to anyone!
Call me!....I promise to be very quiet!
But!........
If one day you don't get an answer!
Come Quick!..I may need you!

***LOVEHEART3***

*Dare to be*

When a new day begins,,,,,,dare to smile gratefully.
When there is darkness,,,,,,dare to be the first to shine a light.
When there is injustice,,,,,,dare to be the first to condemn it.
When something seems difficult,,,,dare to do it anyway.
When life seems to beat you down,,,,,,dare to fight back.
When there seems no hope,,,,,dare to find some.
When you're feeling tired,,,,dare to keep going.
When times are tough,,,,,dare to be tougher.
When love hurts you,,,,,dare to love again.
When someone is hurting,,,,dare to help them heal.
When another is lost,,,,,dare to help them find a way.
When a friend falls,,,,dare to be the first to extend a hand.
When you cross paths with another,,,,dare to make them smile.
When you feel great,,,,dare to help someone else feel great to.
When the day is ended,,,,dare to feel as you've done your best.

*Dare to be the best you can*

*At all times..Dare to Be*

*Loveheart3*

*Life*

Life! for me is getting so much better now.
All the hurt i have kept inside is slowly draining.
I thought i would never survive without him,
How wrong i was,...My friends have been my rock.
I want to thank them all for all their kindness and understanding.
Life is for living! and i am going to live it to the full.
So much more to do and see,so many places to go.
More loves to share.No more time for tears...
Happiness from here on!....

*Loveheart3*

****NEVER****

Never say!.....I LOVE YOU!....if you really don't care!
Never talk about feelings!....if they are really not THERE!
Never hold my hand!........if you're gonna break my HEART!
Never say you're going to!...if you don't plan to START!
Never look into my eyes!.......if all you do is LIE!
Never say hi!.....if you really mean GOODBYE!
If you really mean forever!....then say that you will TRY!
Never say forever!......cause forever makes me CRY!

****LOVEHEART3****

So so tired of this hurt...:(

God!...does this hurt never end......You fall in love and
it all goes wrong again....so so tired of it....I dont think
my heart could take anymore of this........I think i will
give the love racket up for good..cant trust anyone...
